title: Application of chapter, interstate, or foreign commerce
context: ยง271-3 Application of chapter, interstate, or foreign commerce. Neither this chapter nor any provision hereof shall apply to commerce with foreign nations or to interstate commerce, except insofar as the application is permitted under the Constitution and laws of the United States. [L 1961, c 121, pt of ยง2; Supp, ยง106C-3; HRS ยง271-3] Attorney General Opinions Commission jurisdiction extends over motor carriers handling property under through route and joint fare arrangements. Att. Gen. Op. 63-26. Case Notes Hawaii household goods movers no longer exempt from Interstate Commerce Commission regulation. 395 F. Supp. 261.
